name: Testing
description: Testing tools and frameworks for software quality assurance

commands.name: Run Jest Tests
commands.description: Runs Jest test suite. Jest is a JavaScript testing framework that provides a complete testing solution with mocking, coverage, and watch mode.

commands.name: Run Jest in Watch Mode
commands.description: Runs Jest tests in watch mode. This automatically re-runs tests when files change, making it ideal for development workflow.

commands.name: Run Jest with Coverage
commands.description: Runs Jest tests with coverage reporting. This generates detailed coverage reports showing which code is tested and which isn't.

commands.name: Open Cypress
commands.description: Opens Cypress Test Runner in interactive mode. Cypress is a JavaScript end-to-end testing framework that runs in the browser.

commands.name: Run Cypress Tests
commands.description: Runs Cypress tests in headless mode. This is useful for continuous integration environments where you need to run tests without a GUI.

commands.name: Run Cypress E2E Tests
commands.description: Runs Cypress end-to-end tests specifically. This focuses on testing the complete user workflow from start to finish.

commands.name: Install Playwright
commands.description: Installs Playwright browsers and dependencies. Playwright is a cross-browser testing framework that supports multiple browsers.

commands.name: Run Playwright Tests
commands.description: Runs Playwright tests. Playwright provides reliable end-to-end testing for modern web applications across multiple browsers.

commands.name: Open Playwright UI
commands.description: Opens Playwright UI mode for interactive test development and debugging. This provides a visual interface for test execution.

commands.name: Run Selenium Tests
commands.description: Runs Selenium tests using pytest. Selenium is a web automation framework that allows testing across different browsers.

commands.name: Run pytest
commands.description: Runs pytest test suite. pytest is a Python testing framework that makes it easy to write simple and scalable test cases.

commands.name: Run pytest in Watch Mode
commands.description: Runs pytest in watch mode. This automatically re-runs tests when files change, providing immediate feedback during development.

commands.name: Run pytest with Coverage
commands.description: Runs pytest with coverage reporting. This shows which parts of your code are tested and which need more test coverage.

commands.name: Run Mocha Tests
commands.description: Runs Mocha test suite. Mocha is a flexible JavaScript test framework for Node.js and the browser.

commands.name: Run Mocha in Watch Mode
commands.description: Runs Mocha tests in watch mode. This automatically re-runs tests when files change, providing immediate feedback.

commands.name: Run Vitest
commands.description: Runs Vitest test suite. Vitest is a fast unit test framework designed for Vite projects with native TypeScript support.

commands.name: Open Vitest UI
commands.description: Opens Vitest UI for interactive test development. This provides a visual interface for running and debugging tests.

commands.name: Run Karma Tests
commands.description: Runs Karma test runner. Karma is a test runner that allows you to execute JavaScript code in multiple real browsers.

commands.name: Run Jasmine Tests
commands.description: Runs Jasmine test suite. Jasmine is a behavior-driven development framework for testing JavaScript code.

commands.name: Run AVA Tests
commands.description: Runs AVA test suite. AVA is a test runner for Node.js with a concise API, detailed error output, and parallel execution.

commands.name: Run Tape Tests
commands.description: Runs Tape test suite. Tape is a simple test framework that produces TAP output for Node.js and browsers.

commands.name: Run Chai Tests
commands.description: Runs tests with Chai assertion library. Chai is a BDD/TDD assertion library for Node.js and the browser.

commands.name: Run Sinon Tests
commands.description: Runs tests with Sinon mocking library. Sinon provides standalone test spies, stubs, and mocks for JavaScript.

commands.name: Run Enzyme Tests
commands.description: Runs tests with Enzyme for React component testing. Enzyme is a JavaScript testing utility for React.

commands.name: Run Testing Library Tests
commands.description: Runs tests with React Testing Library. Testing Library provides utilities for testing React components in a way that resembles how users interact with your app.

commands.name: Run Storybook Tests
commands.description: Runs Storybook tests. Storybook provides a development environment for UI components with testing capabilities.

commands.name: Run Lighthouse Audit
commands.description: Runs Lighthouse audit to analyze web app performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO. Generates an HTML report with detailed recommendations.

commands.name: Run Pa11y Accessibility Tests
commands.description: Runs Pa11y accessibility tests. Pa11y is a command-line interface for testing web accessibility using various accessibility standards.

commands.name: Run axe-core Tests
commands.description: Runs axe-core accessibility tests. axe-core is a library for automated accessibility testing that works with any modern browser environment.

commands.name: Run WebdriverIO Tests
commands.description: Runs WebdriverIO tests. WebdriverIO is a progressive automation framework built for Node.js for testing modern web and mobile applications.

commands.name: Run Puppeteer Tests
commands.description: Runs Puppeteer tests. Puppeteer is a Node.js library that provides a high-level API to control Chrome/Chromium over the DevTools Protocol.

commands.name: Run Selenium WebDriver Tests
commands.description: Runs Selenium WebDriver tests. Selenium WebDriver is a web automation framework that allows you to execute tests against different browsers.

commands.name: Run Appium Tests
commands.description: Runs Appium tests. Appium is an open-source automation tool for testing mobile applications, native apps, and hybrid apps.

commands.name: Run Detox Tests
commands.description: Runs Detox tests. Detox is a gray box end-to-end testing and automation library for mobile apps.

commands.name: Run Cucumber Tests
commands.description: Runs Cucumber tests. Cucumber is a tool for behavior-driven development that allows you to write tests in plain language.

commands.name: Run Gauge Tests
commands.description: Runs Gauge tests. Gauge is a test automation tool that takes the pain out of writing and maintaining regression tests.

commands.name: Run Robot Framework Tests
commands.description: Runs Robot Framework tests. Robot Framework is a generic test automation framework for acceptance testing and acceptance test-driven development.

commands.name: Run Postman Tests
commands.description: Runs Postman tests using Newman. Newman is a command-line collection runner for Postman that allows you to run and test a Postman collection directly from the command line.

commands.name: Run JMeter Tests
commands.description: Runs JMeter performance tests. Apache JMeter is an Apache project that can be used as a load testing tool for analyzing and measuring the performance of a variety of services.

commands.name: Run Gatling Tests
commands.description: Runs Gatling performance tests. Gatling is an open-source load testing framework based on Scala, Akka, and Netty.

commands.name: Run Artillery Tests
commands.description: Runs Artillery performance tests. Artillery is a modern, powerful, and easy-to-use load testing toolkit.

commands.name: Run k6 Tests
commands.description: Runs k6 performance tests. k6 is a modern load testing tool, built for developer productivity and ease of use.
